content: half of stitches k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before end of row k2tog k1 round 2 knit all repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 20 sts remain on needle cut long tail thread on darning needle and move stitches from needle to darning needle pulling through all stitches and cinching tight to close gap weave in tail or keep to use for securing pom pom with tail from the cast on edge thread it onto needle and weave through knit gaps and cinch tight to close gap at the start of the hat weave in end if adding a faux fur pom pom insert bottom half of hat into the top half sew large button near the top of the crown on the inside of the hat attaching to outer hat attach pom pom to top of outside of the hat by bringing elastic loop in towards the inside and wrapping it around the button you sewed on the inside to secure in place enjoy © jackie henderson
